name: Polarity Logic Invariants
description: Tier-08 defines polarity and logic invariants in the Θ-system: conservation of polarity, tensor-sign preservation, and consistency between truth values Π and polarity Θ.

invariants.name: Polarity Conservation Invariant
invariants.intent: Ensure that no operator silently creates or destroys polarity.
invariants.informal\_statement: Net polarity across a closed system can only change via explicitly declared polarity source/sink operators.

invariants.name: Polarity Tensor-Sign Invariant
invariants.intent: Ensure tensor contractions preserve global sign pattern.
invariants.informal\_statement: Any Θ-tensor contraction preserves the global sign pattern, up to explicit sign-flip operators.

invariants.name: Truth-Polarity Bridge Invariant
invariants.intent: Lock truth evaluation Π to Θ-polarity structure.
invariants.informal\_statement: Truth evaluation must be compatible with polarity: Π cannot contradict Θ without explicit negation or contradiction witness.
